formatted_in_depth_analysis.statement: Fe-based molecular catalysts anchored to substrates show enhanced ORR activity, surpassing Pt/C catalysts in some cases.
The catalytic activity of metallocorroles for ORR is strongly influenced by the metal center, with Fe showing moderate activity compared to Co and Cu.

reflection_results.statement: Fe-based molecular catalysts anchored to substrates show enhanced ORR activity, surpassing Pt/C catalysts in some cases.
The catalytic activity of metallocorroles for ORR is strongly influenced by the metal center, with Fe showing moderate activity compared to Co and Cu.
